title: Allocation of a land located within the 'Ape Gama Premises' in Battaramulla for the construction of 'Amaradewa Asapuwa'
decision_details: - Considering the incomparable contribution made to the Sri Lankan musical field by Pandith W.D. Amaradewa, the renowned Artist, it has been proposed to establish the  'Amaradewa Asapuwa' to conserve his musical creations and the musical tradition for the benefit of the future generation.  As such, the proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, the Minister of Megapolis and Western Development, to allocate a land in extent of 100 perches situated within the 'Ape Gama Premises' in Battaramulla to construct the 'Amaradewa Asapuwa', was approved by the Cabinet.
